name: HaunTopicRadioPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Haunted Attraction Podcast”
”Alexa, start Haunted Attraction Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Haunted Attraction Podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haunted attraction podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have you always wanted to know what goes on behind the scenes of Haunted Attractions, Scare Attractions, and Halloween? We tell those stories here!

We capture the stories of the people behind the scary events and share tips along the way on HOW YOU can make your own Haunted House scary and effective...without spending lots of money to do it. We've done it and are still doing it.

Join us, Brian Foreman and Darryl Plunkie, as we pick the brains of the professionals that make up the Haunted Attraction Industry!

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Haunted Attraction Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Haunted Attraction Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
